name: Forever Bullet
description:
"Fill the screen with bullets... but don't get too OUT OF CONTROL!"

In this top down shooter your bullets bounce off the walls and stick around FOREVER! (Well, until they hit an enemy... or you...)

Flood the screen with bullets to maximize your points, points earned are multiplied by the number of bullets on screen! It gets pretty hectic pretty quickly. It's basically a bullet hell where all the bullets are yours.

Get upgrades after each level. See if you can beat level 3!

(This game is tough as nails.)
